name: planing, beam, hardwood, u=20% | shavings, hardwood, loose, measured as dry mass | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23454/documentation

This dataset represents the planing of one m3 hardwood beam that has been air dried or kiln dried to 20% moisture content. The ratio of kiln dried to air dried raw beam input corresponds to the estimated market mix. The planing mill is assumed to be located on the sawmill site. The emissions during the planing are excluded due to lack of data. The suction of the shavings is modeled in a separate activity.;The data was provided by and approved by the Swiss forest industry (Holzindustrie Schweiz HIS).;Within ecoinvent, three products - boards, beams and laths - are distinguished:

Planing process starting from air dried respectively kiln dried hardwood beam, at sawmill site.

This activity ends with planed hardwood beam, at plant. The dataset includes the planing process at the sawmill site and input of wood. The dataset does not include dust emissions.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
